adr_address: 3030 Lawrence Ave E, Scarborough, ON M1P 1A1, Canada
formatted_address: 3030 Lawrence Ave E, Scarborough, ON M1P 1A1, Canada
name: Dr. Morvarid Hessami Booshehri

reviews.text: I was very happy because Dr Hessami was the first dermatologist to find the right medication for the skin problem that I had. I had other conditions and wanted to see her because I was so sure she could help me with the other problems too. The only problem was the receptionist or the assistant that takes calls. I left a voicemail couple of times to get a follow up appointment (which was before it’s been a year from the first appointment) but no one got back to me. So I tried again recently even though it was over a year and so I was told I need a referral. I do understand I need a referral so I would’ve got one but the receptionist was so rude, while I was asking a question, she hung up on me and had an attitude for no reason. I was not going to anyone else because I wanted to see Dr Hessami only but the assistant or whoever that takes calls was probably having a bad day, I don’t know and I don’t care but it was still disappointing and I felt insulted and disrespected that she was rude and hung up while I was talking. And just because I don’t wanna deal with her face and attitude in the front desk, I have to start looking for another dermatologist now.

The Dr. Prescribed me with a cream ( she told me its her own lil mixture of 3 creams) and it had gotten worst... I dont know what it is. Maybe its my skin but im Freaking out. Hoping the contact me asap I left 2 voice mails and no one got back to me.

You can tell she cares about her job/patients. That being said, they do overbook resulting in very long wait times. Also, my appointment felt rushed, despite her niceness. I also did not appreciate the student learners being in the room as I felt like a case study. This was my first time here and I was not asked if I was okay with two extra people in the room, seemed insensitive.
The doctor, and her staff are caring, professional, proficient, and compassionate. Most highly recommended.

Never had a better derm in my life, I have a life threatening condition and she's the only who I can get an appointment with in one day after sending her an emergency email. It's because of these emergency appointments some of you have to wait a little longer or it may be because she's the one going above and beyond for her patients. I absolutely recommend Dr. Hessami, thank you for saving my life and continue to do so.
